title: I keep crashing right before the loading screen after champ select
body:
So basically every time I go to champ select and do the things I just randomly get stuck 
I've tried reinstalling and this doesn't help I've lost lp because of this and I've gotten a leaver buster does anyone know how I can fix this

Ps: I use a Mac ;/ I didn't want to but that's the only product my dad ever gets and I don't have the money to buy a pc :/

replies.body:
Macs crashing after champ select is often caused by a connection issue to the servers. When your connection drops off during the switch from champ select to the game servers, you'll typically see either a black screen or your client to disappear entirely. I suggest working through the steps in our [Mac Connection Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac)in order to resolve this.

A common workaround for this issue is to spam the **ENTER or RETURN** key after you leave champ select. If this works, it confirms that the core cause of your crashes is a connection problem.

Let me know if this helped.
